data.name: EmployeeRefuseIssueCertificate
data.value: Employee {0} refused to sign the application for electronic signature certificate

data.name: ErrorTimeoutDocVerification
data.value: A response from the certification authority on document verification has timed out. Send the request for electronic signature certificate again.

data.name: ErrorTimeoutCertificateIssued
data.value: A response from the certification authority on issuing the certificate has timed out. Send the request for electronic signature certificate again.

data.name: ErrorTimeoutSignStatementESIA
data.value: The employee has not signed the application for electronic signature certificate on the Gosuslugi portal in time. Contact the employee and send the application again if required.

data.name: ErrorEmployeeRefuseIssueCertificate
data.value: The employee has refused to sign the application for electronic signature certificate. Contact the employee and send the request again if required.

data.name: ErrorUserNotFoundInESIA
data.value: The employee is not found on the Gosuslugi portal, or his account has not been verified. Contact the employee and send the request for electronic signature certificate again if required.

data.name: ErrorConfirmationRejected
data.value: The employee has declined the request for electronic signature certificate.

data.name: ErrorConfirmationExpired
data.value: The employee has not confirmed their identity on the Gosuslugi portal in time.

data.name: SaveCertificateError
data.value: Errors occurred while saving electronic signature certificate No. {0} for employee: {1}.

data.name: GetRequestByIdError
data.value: Errors occurred while sending a request to issue electronic signature certificate No. {0} for employee: {1}.

data.name: GetRequestError
data.value: Errors occurred while receiving a request to issue an electronic signature certificate for employee: {0}.

data.name: CertificateIssueErrorInstruction
data.value: Contact the employee to find out the reason for rejection. If necessary, click on the “Issue certificate” button and initiate the issuance of the certificate again. If the employee wants to sign paper documents, complete the assignment.
